hanzi-su-wiki:
電

Значения

Электричество

Мнемоника

  • Во время дождя 雨 молния тянется 电 от неба до земли.

  • Идёт дождь 雨, и сверкают молнии (как 乚) на рисовом поле 田.

Варианты

电

lightning; electricity; electric (bound form); to get (or give) an electric shock; phone call or telegram etc; to send via telephone or telegram etc
молния; электричество; электрическая (переплетенная форма); получить (или нанести) удар электрическим током; телефонный звонок или телеграмма и т. д .; отправить по телефону или телеграмме и т. д.

koohiiStory1: Think of a two natural sources of electricity: electrical storms (a form of weather) and electrical eels. 電話 でんわ phone, call.
koohiiStory2: This kanji was invented by the first Chinaman to discover electricity. He was so unfortunate, he stepped on an electric eel and got struck by lighting at the same time.

電柱(でんちゅう): telephone pole, telegraph pole, lightpole
電波(でんぱ): electro-magnetic wave

電力(でんりょく): electric power

電灯(でんとう): light

電車(でんしゃ): electric train

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You're standing in the middle of a rice paddy in the rain with an umbrella. You're standing here because there's nothing else that's very tall around you. You want to get hit by electricity (aka lightning) to show that it exists.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Get hit by the electricity. How does it feel?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After the electricity hits you, you feel your face. In it is a huge dent.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Feel the indent in your face. It doesn't hurt, strangely, but it is pretty huge. Panic about this dent a bit.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 雷 (かみなり、いかずち、ライ гром, молния).

humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from " rain " to " shen ", "申" is also a sound symbol. " Shen " is like lightning, the first article of " electricity ". Because lightning often accompanies thunderstorms, " rain " was added as a sign. Later, " shen " was borrowed as the ninth place of the earthly branch, so " electricity " was used to express the original meaning of lightning.

Jin Wentong is falsely called "梃", and Fansheng covers: "Electricity (梃)轸", "梃轸" means a wooden rear cross wood (Ma Chengyuan).

Bamboo slips in the Han Dynasty borrowed " shen " as " electricity " to express lightning. "Wang Bing": "Move like a god of thunder (electric)", see " God ".

Han silk book borrows " dian " as " electricity ", "Mawangdui. The 66th line of the Fifty-Two Sick Recipes: "Hou (hou) Tiandian (electric) and both hands are stricken (Mo), Xiang (xiang)dian (electric) wishing it", which means waiting for lightning in the sky and rubbing both hands. With the lightning to announce.
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " rain " to " shen ", "申" is also a sound symbol. " Shen " is like lightning, the first article of " electricity ". Because lightning often accompanies thunderstorms, " rain " was added as a sign. Later, " shen " was borrowed as the ninth place of the earthly branch, so " electricity " was used to express the original meaning of lightning. "Said Wen": "𩃓(𩃡电), the yin and yang stimulate the yao. Congyu Congshen. 𩃿, ancient text."
humanum_full_description:
金文從「雨」從「申」，「申」亦是聲符。「申」象閃電，是「電」的初文。由於閃電多伴隨雷雨，所以加「雨」為意符，後來「申」被借用為地支第九位，故以「電」來表示閃電的本義。

　　金文通假為「梃」，番生簋蓋：「電(梃)軫」，「梃軫」表示木製的車後橫木(馬承源)。

　　漢代竹簡借「神」為「電」，表示閃電，《銀雀山漢簡．王兵》：「動如雷神(電)」，參見「神」。

　　漢帛書假借「甸」為「電」，《馬王堆．五十二病方》第66行：「侯(候)天甸(電)而兩手相靡(摩)，鄉(嚮)甸(電)祝之」，表示等候天空閃電便兩手互相摩擦，對着閃電祝告。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「雨」從「申」，「申」亦是聲符。「申」象閃電，是「電」的初文。由於閃電多伴隨雷雨，所以加「雨」為意符，後來「申」被借用為地支第九位，故以「電」來表示閃電的本義。《說文》：「𩃓(𩃡電)，陰陽激燿也。从雨从申。𩃿，古文電。」

①物理學現象，可通過化學的或物理的方法獲得的一種能，用以使燈發光、機械轉動等：電力。電能。電熱。電臺。
②陰雨天，空中雲層放電時發出的光：閃電。雷電。
③指電報：通電。賀電。
④指打電報：電邀。電匯。電告。
⑤遭受電流打擊：電了我一下。

金文從「 雨 」從「 申 」，「 申 」亦是聲符。「 申 」象閃電，是「 電 」的初文。由於閃電多伴隨雷雨，所以加「 雨 」為意符，後來「 申 」被借用為地支第九位，故以「 電 」來表示閃電的本義。 金文通假為「 梃 」，番生簋蓋：「電(梃)軫」，「梃軫」表示木製的車後橫木(馬承源)。 漢代竹簡借「 神 」為「 電 」，表示閃電，《銀雀山漢簡．王兵》：「動如雷神(電)」，參見「 神 」。 漢帛書假借「 甸 」為「 電 」，《馬王堆．五十二病方》第66行：「侯(候)天甸(電)而兩手相靡(摩)，鄉(嚮)甸(電)祝之」，表示等候天空閃電便兩手互相摩擦，對着閃電祝告。
Inscriptions from " rain" to " shen", " 申" is also a sound symbol. " Shen" is like lightning, the first article of " electricity". Because lightning often accompanies thunderstorms, " rain" was added as a sign. Later, " shen" was borrowed as the ninth place of the earthly branch, so " electricity" was used to express the original meaning of lightning. Jin Wentong is falsely called " 梃", and Fansheng covers: "Electricity (梃)轸", "梃轸" means a wooden rear cross wood (Ma Chengyuan). Bamboo slips in the Han Dynasty borrowed " shen" as " electricity" to express lightning. "Wang Bing": "Move like a god of thunder (electric)", see " God". Han silk book borrows " dian" as " electricity", "Mawangdui. The 66th line of the Fifty-Two Sick Recipes: "Hou (hou) Tiandian (electric) and both hands are stricken (Mo), Xiang (xiang)dian (electric) wishing it", which means waiting for lightning in the sky and rubbing both hands. With the lightning to announce.

電字的基本解释

電
diàn
见“电”。

電字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diàn］
［《廣韻》堂練切，去霰，定。］
“电1”的繁体字。
(1)闪电。
(2)光耀。
(3)形容迅疾，快速。
(4)旧时请人明察的敬辞。参见“電察”。
(5)有电荷存在和电荷变化的现象。电是一种很重要的能源，广泛用于生产、生活和科学实验等各方面。
(6)使触电。
(7)电报电话的省称。

電字的康熙字典解释
電字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
電字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diàn］
["Guangyun" Tang practice cutting, go to chao, set. ]
Traditional characters for "电1".
(1) Lightning.
(2) Shining.
(3) Describe swift and fast.
(4) Respectful remarks in the old days when people were invited to observe clearly. See "Electrical Inspection".
(5) There is a phenomenon of charge existence and charge change. Electricity is a very important energy source, which is widely used in production, life and scientific experiments.
(6) Make an electric shock.
(7) The provincial name of the telegraph and telephone.

diàn
вм. 电

電

Значения

Электричество

Мнемоника

  • Во время дождя 雨 молния тянется 电 от неба до земли.

  • Идёт дождь 雨, и сверкают молнии (как 乚) на рисовом поле 田.

Варианты

电

Radicals: 雨, 田, 乚  (rain, rice-paddy, umbrella)
Meaning Mnemonic
You're standing in the middle of a rice paddy in the rain with an umbrella. You're standing here because there's nothing else that's very tall around you. You want to get hit by electricity (aka lightning) to show that it exists.
Get hit by the electricity. How does it feel?
Reading Mnemonic
After the electricity hits you, you feel your face. In it is a huge dent.
Feel the indent in your face. It doesn't hurt, strangely, but it is pretty huge. Panic about this dent a bit.

乙 (второй), 田 (рисовое поле), 雨 (дождь)
Не путать: 雷 (かみなり、いかずち、ライ гром, молния).
